name: stayup-lambda-monitor
description: StayUp Lambda monitoring workers for multi-region website monitoring

scripts.build:lambda: npm run build && npm run package
scripts.deploy:us-east: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name stayup-monitor-us-east --zip-file fileb://lambda-function.zip --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:eu-west: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name stayup-monitor-eu-west --zip-file fileb://lambda-function.zip --region eu-west-1
scripts.deploy:ap-south: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name stayup-monitor-ap-south --zip-file fileb://lambda-function.zip --region ap-south-1
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:us-east && npm run deploy:eu-west && npm run deploy:ap-south

author: Abhishek Gusain
